post_title: FS: Schlei, Clark, Thornton(SL) Off Backs
post_content:
I have the following T206 cards, all with scarcer backs for sale.

Josh Clark (Columbus) Polar Bear/Double Name SGC 2.5 $200 (Great Centering for a double name!)
Admiral Schlei (Portrait) SGC 3 Old Mill $150
Woodie Thornton SGC 5 Old Mill $950.00 (Great eye appeal, corners)


All prices include shipping.

I recently upgraded my PC to all 4 or better. I'm selling my duplicates here and on the FB T206 group over the next few days. I have over several graded T206 cards available. I'll be listing them here, but email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] if you'd like a list.

If you want to purchase any cards:
1. The first person to post a full price offer on this thread will get the card.
2. Email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] and let me know which card(s) you want.
3. Remit payment by PayPal - FF.
4. Cards will be shipped within 2 business days.
